mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.title, d.write_date, d.status, a.*, sub.count, tem.*, emp.name employee_name, emp.id employee_id FROM document d LEFT JOIN approval a ON a.document_id = d.id LEFT JOIN employee emp ON d.writer_id=emp.id LEFT JOIN template tem ON tem.temp_id=d.template_id INNER JOIN ON sub.document_id=d.id WHERE a.employee_id=#{employeeVO.id} AND rank BETWEEN 0 and sub.count ORDER BY d.id DESC
SELECT doc.*, tem.* FROM document doc LEFT JOIN template tem ON doc.template_id = tem.temp_id ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pager.startIndex},#{pager.perPage}

SELECT doc.*, tem.*, app.*, e.name employee_name, e.id employee_id, d.name department_name, c.name "level" FROM document doc LEFT JOIN template tem ON doc.template_id = tem.temp_id LEFT JOIN approval app ON app.document_id = doc.id INNER JOIN employee e ON e.id=app.employee_id INNER JOIN department d on d.id=e.department_id INNER join code c on c.id=e.pos_id and c.type_id =300 WHERE doc.id=#{id} ORDER BY app.rank
